gov.nih.nlm.meme.client
Class ClientToolkit

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.swing.SwingToolkit
      gov.nih.nlm.meme.MEMEToolkit
          gov.nih.nlm.meme.client.ClientToolkit
All Implemented Interfaces:
MEMEConstants, SwingConstants
public class ClientToolkit
extends MEMEToolkit

This toolkit sets up the environment used by client applications. It is important that the initialize() method is called before any attempt is made to connect to the server. Calling it multiple times has no ill effect. Generally, initializing the client toolkit will not be required by client applications because the ClientAPI automatically does it.

Author:
MEME Group

Method Detail

initialize

public static void initialize()
                       throws InitializationException
Initializes client application environment. In practice all it does is initialize the MEMEToolkit. Once this method has been called, calling it again has no effect.

Throws:
InitializationException - if initialization failed.

initialize

public static void initialize(Properties props)
                       throws InitializationException
Initializes client application environment. In practice all it does is initialize the MEMEToolkit. Once this method has been called, calling it again has no effect.

Parameters:
props - An object Properties.
Throws:
InitializationException - if initialization failed.
